decision_conditions: Condition : 1 - The development hereby permitted shall be begun before the expiration of three years from the date of this permission.
Condition : 2 - The materials to be used in the construction of the external surfaces of the extension hereby permitted shall match those used in the existing building.

Condition : 3 - The proposed development shall be carried out in all respects in accordance with the proposals contained in the application and the plans submitted (02/10 - 03/10 (Rev B); received 29/11/2017. 01/10, 04/10 & 05/10 (Rev C); received 05/01/2018) therewith and approved by the Local Planning Authority, or as shall have been otherwise agreed in writing by the Local Planning Authority before the building is used.

Condition : 4 - No additional windows or other glazed openings shall be formed in the side walls of the extension hereby approved and no additional doors inserted in the building without the prior written consent of the Local Planning Authority.

Condition : 5 - The extension hereby approved shall be used solely as part of the house known as 46 Southville Road and shall not be occupied as a separate dwelling nor used for business purposes and the premises shall not be used as a house in multiple occupation, including any use within Class C4 of The Town and Country Planning (Use Classes) Order 1987 (as amended) or such other legislation as may subsequently supersede it.

Condition : 6 - "Before the development hereby permitted commences the applicant must either:
a.	Investigate the site for landfill gas to the satisfaction of the LPA, to ascertain whether gas protection measures are required.  Where measures are required the details shall be submitted to, and approved by, the LPA.
Or;
b.	The applicant shall install gas protection measures as a precautionary measure without first investigating the site.  The details of these measures shall be submitted to, and approved by, the LPA.
c.	For a. and b. all required measures shall be installed before the development is first occupied.
Condition : 7 - Prior to first occupation of the extension hereby permitted the outbuildings outlined on the plans hereby approved, shall have been demolished and the ground made good.

Condition : 8 - Notwithstanding the provisions of the Town and Country Planning (General Permitted Development Order) 1995 (or any order revoking or re-enacting that order) no further enlargement of the premises or any additional structures/buildings within the curtilage of the site shall be carried out.
description: Demolition of existing outbuildings and proposed erection of a two storey side extension and a rear roof extension with two roof windows to front elevation
